desc: 30% boost to all parameters, Spark damage and damage taken may considerably boost BB gauge & 50% boost to Spark damage

dictionary.lore: There is a plant with glamorous flowers loved by many people that appears once every hundred years in a certain mythical beast's nest. The flowers are picked by a shrine maiden chosen by the beast, which she then weaves into a colorful crown. It is said that the one who wears the crown is protected and given great strength, but unfortunately few have seen this item in their lifetime.

name: Flower Crown
